Checklist.txt.data:
Ongoing states
🟦 State not relevant
🔼 Ready to be worked on
🔽 Priority low, requires other items
▶️ Currently being worked on
⏯️ Some work done, to be continued
☑️ Logic done, requires user interface
Final states
✳️ Reconceptualized
❎ Deprioritized
✅ Done

▪️ Context Menu
   ✅ Simplify abysmal context menu logic
   ✅ Nest menu functions inside class
   ✅ Context menu templates stored in virtual file
   ✳️ Construct menus through static classes
▪️ Properties
   ▶️ Redesign of grid settings window
   🔽 Repurpose settings window for property window

Requirements for 1.0 release
▪️ Notepad App
   ⏯️ Alt menu bar
   🟦 Do you want to save changes to Untitled? 
   🟦 Save - Don't Save - Cancel
▪️ Code Inspector App
   ⏯️ Alt menu bar
   🟦 HTML, CSS and JS notation colouring
▪️ Explorer App
   🟦 Alt menu bar
   🟦 Side navigation bar
   🟦 Open file explorer
   🟦 Save file explorer
   🟦 Backwards and forwards buttons
   🟦 Edit address bar
   🟦 Search bar
   🟦 Views
▪️ Settings App
   🟦 System settings
   🟦 Style settings
   🟦 Audio settings
   ⏯️ Desktop settings
   🟦 Application settings
   🟦 File settings
▪️ Taskbar
   🟦 Window tray
   🟦 Task tray
   🟦 Start menu
   🟦 Stash viewer
   🟦 Time / Date
   🟦 Volume
   🟦 Place on either border
▪️ Windows
   🟦 Maximize
   🟦 Minimize
   🟦 Check for out of bounds header
   🟦 Generate comfortable starting position
   🟦 Remember window size and position per task
▪️ Metafiles
   🟦 New Metafile - Metadata
   🟦 Insert URL - Type drop-down menu
   🟦 Pasting URL immediately creates Metafile
▪️ Metafile types
   🟦 Webpage (.url)
   🟦 Video (.vid)
   🟦 Audio (.aud)
   🟦 Image (.img)
   🟦 Download (.dl)
▪️ Applications
   🟦 Framer
   🟦 Meta Media Player
   🟦 Image Viewer
   🟦 Properties
▪️ JSON files
   🟦 Turn config into JSON file
   🟦 Make JSON editor app
   🟦 Virtualize JSON to represent its object reference
▪️ Other files
   ⏯️ JS files
   🟦 CSS files
   🟦 HTML files
   🟦 Shortcut files
▪️ Filesystem
   🟦 Virtualize all system files
   🟦 Trash and Stash
   ☑️ Select new vertex (reassign desktop directory) 
   🟦 Move files
   ✅ Save storage state to core JSON 
   ✅ Load storage state from core JSON 
▪️ LocalStorage
   🟦 Save on each change
   🟦 Measure remaining available space
▪️ Misc
   🟦 About HTML
